titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The Revelli years [sound recording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Date/Time and Place of Event
odd.p: Recorded in Ann Arbor, Michigan between January 1950 and April 1971.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Huntington Station, N.Y. : Golden Crest Records, p1980-1983.

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Performers, University of Michigan Symphony Band, University of Michigan Marching Band; conductor, William D. Revelli; narrator, George Cavender.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1. With the University of Michigan Symphony Band -- 2. With the University of Michigan Marching Band -- 3. With famous artists and the the University of Michigan Symphonic Band -- 4. Original band-works of distinguished composers with the University of Michgian Symphony Band -- 5. With the University of Michigan Symphony Band.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Volume programs laid in containters. Programs include program notes by William D. Revelli, biographical sketches, and illustrations (some col.).
